summary.para: Specifies the version of the TBS context implementation. You must use this structure if your application works with both versions of TPM.
Applications interacting with just TPM 2.0 should pass a pointer to a TBS_CONTEXT_PARAMS2 structure, with version set to TPM_VERSION_20, and includeTpm20 set to 1.
Applications interacting with both TPM 1.2 and TPM 2.0 should pass a pointer to a TBS_CONTEXT_PARAMS2 structure, with version set to TPM_VERSION_20, includeTpm20 set to 1, and includeTpm12 set to 1.

member.name: TBS_CONTEXT_PARAMS2.version
member.summary: The version of the TBS context implementation. This must be set to TPM_VERSION_20.

member.name: TBS_CONTEXT_PARAMS2.asUINT32
member.summary: Used to access all of the bits in one variable.

member.name: TBS_CONTEXT_PARAMS2.includeTpm12
member.summary: Set to 1 if the TBS commands are to work on TPM 1.2.

member.name: TBS_CONTEXT_PARAMS2.includeTpm20
member.summary: Set to 1 if the TBS commands are to work on TPM 2.0.

member.name: TBS_CONTEXT_PARAMS2.requestRaw
member.summary: Set to 1 to request raw content.
